description: Deletes a user's Secure Shell (SSH) public key.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: A system-assigned unique identifier for a file transfer protocol-enabled server instance that has the user assigned to it.

parameters.name: SshPublicKeyId
parameters.description: A unique identifier used to reference your user's specific SSH key.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: A unique string that identifies a user whose public key is being deleted.
